body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Stephen Campbell and I'm a customer service representative at ABC Car Dealership. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Kayla. How can I assist you today? Could you please provide me with your phone number and email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is six five five two three four eight nine one zero and my email address is kayla.flores@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Kayla. Can you also confirm your home address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my address is two zero zero Elm Street, Cityville, State ABC, ZIP code one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for confirming, Kayla. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Kayla. Thank you for reaching out. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact us. Have a great day!
